title: bittalk7
author: bittalk7
content: It seems this is about the apex of mining. I'm debating buying new or used right now. I still wasn't able to get my second s9 working... Kinda bummed , but looking towards the future!

comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: When i look at the price right now for the L7 Antminer i would say dont buy one and maybe invest the half of the money directly in the coin you want to mine.Should be right now a good time to buy the Coin at the current Market price as everything is low now.There are some prices i found for the L7 Antminer and thats all others as cheap : https://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/bitmain/antminer-l7-9-5gh

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.created_time: June 23, 2022, 11:29:54 PMLast edit: June 24, 2022, 03:22:19 AM by philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: Lafu on June 23, 2022, 11:10:28 PMWhen i look at the price right now for the L7 Antminer i would say dont buy one and maybe invest the half of the money directly in the coin you want to mine.Should be right now a good time to buy the Coin at the current Market price as everything is low now.There are some prices i found for the L7 Antminer and thats all others as cheap : https://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/bitmain/antminer-l7-9-5ghHard to think it is worth over 12kit makes about 25 a day power cost is 85 k-watts or 8.50 so net 16 to 17 means over 700 days to break even

comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on June 23, 2022, 11:29:54 PMHard to think it is worth over 12kit makes about 25 a day power cost is 85 watts or 8.50 so net 16 to 17 means over 700 days to break evenYeah thats what i also think , it takes a long time to get your money back or making some profit with it at this price.Dont know if that price is worth it right now , but in my opinion i guess not.Its a lot of money even you have free electricity to run the miner somewhere.
